fn.p: In these Illustrative Examples, currency amounts are denominated in ‘currency units’ (CU).
References to the Conceptual Framework in this Basis for Conclusions are to the Conceptual Framework for Financial Reporting, issued in 2010 and in effect when the Standard was developed.

In March 2021 the Board issued Covid-19-Related Rent Concessions beyond 30 June 2021, which amended the date in paragraph 46B(b) of IFRS 16 from 30 June 2021 to 30 June 2022 (see paragraphs BC205H–BC205J).
